channel.title: No-IP on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari
channel.description: Recent content in No-IP on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari

item.title: Part 3: A High-Availability DNS Network with AdGuard Home
item.description: Learn to build a high-availability, ad-blocking DNS network with AdGuard Home. This step-by-step guide covers deploying on a homelab server, a free Oracle Cloud VM, and using Docker macvlan for ultimate redundancy.

item.title: How I Built My Own Ad-Blocking DNS Server in the Cloud (2025 Updated Edition!)
item.description: Enjoy a faster, ad-free internet everywhere. This 2025 guide details how to build a free, private DNS server with AdGuard Home on an AWS EC2 instance, complete with SSL encryption and automated renewal.
